ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic smelting
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Build a smelter to melt down and extract metals.
"Everything has its limit – iron ore cannot be educated into gold." - Mark Twain

ResearchProjectDef.label: Metal weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Forge basic metal weapons.
"The Lord made us all out of iron. Then he turns up the heat to forge some of us into steel." – Marie Osmond

ResearchProjectDef.label: Metal casting
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Temper metal and smith larger items.
"The best steel doesn’t always shine the brightest." - Joe Abercrombie

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced bows
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Craft powerful crossbows with higher damage and piercing than most bows, though with longer reload times.
"The archer that shoots badly has a lie ready." - Spanish proverb
